case.state: Hmm... I seem to have been transported to yet another new world in the middle of a Puyo battle, but if this works like every other world I've been at, all I need is to play this game to fix it!
Hey you, stranger! I seem to have been transported to yet another new world, so I'll need your help to play this game so that I can hopefully get transported back home.
Whoa! This masked girl gives me the creeps.
Wait a second, this pink haired girl looks familiar, could it be...?
Hey! Careful with that demon looking, parasol... thingy!
Why would you even bring that huge parasol here?!
With that outfit, that energy and asking for a song? You must be an Idol of some sort, right?
W... wait, a talking butterfly? I guess it's not that weird considering what I've seen but, doesn't that mean it will be out as soon as it loses one hand?
Of course! You are Amy, right? You look a little less... furry than the last time I saw you!
Aww... aren't you just the cutest thing with those fox ears and fluffy tail!
Am I really the only girl here? This feels like it's going to get real sketchy, real soon...
Well, it's going to be nice to solve a problem without having to play Puyo or Tetris for once...
This may neither be Puyo Puyo, nor Tetris, but I'm a fast learner!
Right! Let's poker battle!
Swap!
I'll place these cards on the hold space for now.
If you try to send me garbage cards, I'll send em right back at ya, dealer!
My calculations tell me that swapping these cards will give me an ideal probability.
Hmm... yes.. I'll take these ones and return these ones.
How about this?
Let's experiment!
Try one of these!
Certainly...
You mean I can hold more than one piece at a time?! This is great!
Time to swap!
I pick this one and this one...
Yeah... this should work...
This one can go, but this one will be good.
C'mon, I really need this...
Please work...
Uh... second chance here we go...
One more shot, please be better!
Risking in the past hasn't worked, let's play it safe.
If this works...
Well, as i said I'm terrible at flirting... But since my hand is good, I may as well give it a shot at some point...
Well, this should at least break my bad streak for now.
Hope you enjoyed my quick streak of bad luck, cause here's where I make my comeback!
I knew this couldn't last for much longer, try to beat this!
Tee hee.
Never expected my expertize on maths and calculations to help me in a situation like this!
I won't deny beginner's luck can always be a factor, and one I'll gladly take!
If I understood the rules and values correctly, you should have a hard time beating me this time.
Statistics tell me I should be safe with this hand.
I'm pumped!
I'll solve them all!
Perfect!
Correct!
Lucky♪
It looks like danger is out of this equation.
Even a novice can realize this is a good hand.
You better be ready for a big chain!
Ready or not, here comes my combo!
I hope you have a pretty good chain to counter this one.
Yes! If this hand was a Tetris move, it would probably be the equivalent of a T-spin triple!
Lesson time is over, I hope you got a good score in time or get ready to lose.
Well, well...
This sure changed into a pretty good situation for me, didn't it?
♪ I know I'm safe because this hand is GREAT! G-R-E-A-T! ♪
At any rate, late is better than never, right?
Well, I won't say no to a good hand but, couldn't this show up earlier?
If this doesn't work then nothing will...
Oh thank the Puyos...
Yes! Finally this works out!
Well, one round of safety is always welcome, specially considering my current situation.
Hah! I knew it was a matter of time before my luck changed...
Well, as i said I'm terrible at flirting... But what the heck, I may give it a shot at some point.
Please don't let this bad streak go on...
This better be enough to break my bad streak...
With a bit of luck, this may just be the end of my bad streak...
I may not have played poker before, but I have studied plenty of theory on it, so I should be fine...
No matter the result, it's always fun to learn a new game to play!
Average, but statistics show that average still gives me a decent chance of survival...
This is by no means the first time I've been transported to a new world, this seems to be the one with the most perverted game though...
You know, I always wonder why our adventures always seem to start with someone being teleported to a new strange place...
It seems that no matter what world I end up at, there's always a game to be played, it's fascinating really.
Even on Puyo, there's a bit of randomness involved. Just not as much as in this one.
This is fun.
I'm guessing this is the game people on this world use to solve all their problems, just like we do with Puyo back home?
Looking good!
That's helpful!
Not a bad experiment.
Strange, usually by this time I end up running into Amitie, or Arle, or someone else I know... Could it be that this time I'm really alone for real?
I am playing a game of strip poker with people I barely know cause I'm lost! L-O-S-T ♪
And now I just wait to see if my chain worked.
Nothing fancy, but sometimes you just need constant pressure to make the opponent lose.
Hopefully this small combo will neutralize any attack you send my way.
Small chains will never impress, but they can get the work done.
Just a small chain to hopefully charge my fever meter.
Let's test this out.
Experimentation is always the key to new knowledge!
Don't think that just because I'm new to this type of battle, I'll be easy picking.
I don't know if this will be enough, but you'll at least know I am giving it my all.
As long as this combo is decent enough, I should be safe.
The fact that I have no clue if this is enough is kind of exciting you know?
This is like blindly throwing a medium combo to your rival without checking what they have prepared themselves.
I know this may not be the best combo, but it should get me through this hand.
A challenge to win, maybe? Maybe not!
While not amazing, the odds are still in my favor this time around.
I'm always up to a challenge!
Maybe this is just another one of those elaborate ruses from Satan to try to date Arle... Wait, would that mean he wants to play this game with her?! That's low, even for him!
Come on, don't fail me now!
Now we leave it to destiny...
Nothing else to do, good luck everyone!
Well, as i said I'm terrible at flirting... Almost as terrible as the hand I have...
How many times in a row can I get bad hands...
Well, looks like we can add one more round to my bad streak...
This seriously makes no sense, how many times in a row can I get such bad cards?!
Are you sure we can't change to a Puyo battle instead of poker?
Oh, this is bad, this is bad!
Oh dear...
Well... so much for calculations...
Seriously, what are the chances of this?!
Ow ow ow ow!
Whoops...
I guess I'll have to take the next loss then...
Where is the gametype swap timer when you need it?
Odds are bad for me, but there's always a chance that someone will do even worse.
Classic, a nuisance Puyo ended up blocking my chance to start a chain...
Danger, danger!
Nononono! Miss-drop! Miss-drop!
This might hurt!
I made a mistake...
How can I possibly resolve this predicament...
It was at this moment that I, Ringo Ando, realized that I was doomed...
What the f-actor?!
... I think I may have just committed a careless error.
Son of a digit!
Oh, boysenberry...
This isn't going to end well, is it?
Welp, that didn't work.
Well, there go my chances this time...
Oh well, can't win them all...
Ow! Had I know this card would come I would had...
Back to the drawing board it seems...
Of course this card shows up after I swapped that one...
I'm not one to commit a lot of mistakes... but this hand is certainly one...
Well, this is going to be hard to win...
Heh, you wouldn't happen to have a bad hand as well do ya?
And there goes this hand...
I messed up...
No! No! No!
Why?! Haven't I lost enough?!
Well, I may as well prepare myself early...
Disaster incoming...
I regret everything!
Boy have I, Aella... The question would be which one would you like to know from? Maybe the first one, where I had to learn to break Puyos to stop an ethereal creature from destroying the universe?
Hold up. You mean boats outside of the game pass by here?! It's enough to be like this with you people already!
Personally I thought it was a scandalous act whether you are famous or not...

Well, there's this one Dark Prince I know who I heard talking to Arle, saying how she should be grateful that he reseted the universe so that she could have a happier life or something like that, but honestly, he's had even lamer ways to try to get her to date him...
Exploring ruins is almost certainly a guarantee for adventure, plus if this game doesn't return me home, ruins tend to be a good place to start looking for answers, so I'm in.

Heh, usually I'm not much for gossip, but I guess since this is a different world's gossip it won't matter. Apparently our version of Satan used to be married to a super powerful magician called Lilith, Satan outlived her, and now pursues my friend Arle, who apparently looks very similar to her.
Well, I did bring this one little book to help me summon spells, but... I don't know if you'd be able to use it for anything so...

Thanks for the offer, Meia. But I've already had enough space adventures at the S.S. Tetra. At any rate, part of the deal with Marle and Squares to keep our memories about it was to not go up there again...
Well, everyone would hope to never have to lie, sadly, we all know white lies are sometimes required, Jessie...
Family is always first, not even a doubt about it.

Well, even a million dollars can go on a blink if not spent carefully. I'd probably have to take a bit to think of the best way to invest it in something that will eventually return me even more profits... uhhh.. can I take a bit more to think about it?

Well, considering that both Satan and Ecolo seem to follow Arle Amitie and me on all our adventures somehow, you kinda have to get used to just ignoring the fact that they are probably the very reason we are in trouble in the first place...
Well, my friends aren't exactly the mall shopping type, but considering that my family's store is at Suzuran's shopping district, it's not like it's a strange place for me, Amy.

Heh, I guess it makes sense, the sphere shaped robot scared of creatures that kick spheres. I have tried it a couple of times with maguro but I'm really that good at it, sadly... or gladly in this case?
Sure, Noir! You seem to have plenty experience, so I can't imagine of a better teacher right now.
Sure, Adrien! You seem to have plenty experience, so I can't imagine of a better teacher right now.
GAH! That's it, from now on I'm staying away from you!
Oh, your little friend wants an apple? I'm sure I have a couple more I can spare.
Well, I wish I could have an answer to that, but back at Suzaran High's Physics club we only ended up being me, Maguro and Ritsukuma, and he was there only cause he blew up the chemistry club...
Well, I'm, currently having Maguro teach me a bit, he is an excellent cook!
Heh! I knew I wasn't the only one that did that! Arash.
That sounds extremely dangerous is more than one way, Aella...
Well, I haven't had the chance yet but I'd probably would like to see my partner when it happens...
Well, I haven't had the chance yet but... N... no! I refuse to answer such a personal thing yet.
I'd most definitely be heartbroken. There are just some things that you can't do and expect a relation to survive.
I don't even have a partner right now, and rarely have time for myself like that... that said though, I could probably open a space for me to do it at least a couple times a week....
I don't even have a partner right now... Wait, why do I even have to answer this in front of strangers?!

Well, I can probably count with my fingers the times I've actually seen a video of that kind. I don't dislike them or anything, but between my studies, adventures and the family grocery store I barely have time for stuff like that.
I'm too busy to do that kind of stuff. Can we move along, now?
A question I sadly won't be able to answer until I experience it for the first time...
Don't you feel your questions are becoming a bit too personal for people you've just met?!
I haven't had the chance to be on any of them yet... {small}B... But the thought of getting pinned down in a m... mating press is kinda exciting...{!reset}
I haven't had the chance to be on any of them yet... And that's already sharing way too much info for me...
Nope, nope, nope, nope!
Heh, if you think that hat looks strange, I know a certain someone that uses some sort of weird boot/pant thing, now that is something.
Aww, I remember Cream last time I was in your world, so small and cute, wait, is she really old enough to play cards now?
Hey, whatever helps calm your nerves, Shantae!
Honestly Jim, I'm asking myself that very same question right now...
Unscientific stuff, like YOU!!!

Thankfully, none of my adventures have had the need to be that violent yet. Not that I couldn't, from what Arle told me, our spells have the power to decapitate someone if we are not careful with them.
W... wait a minute?! G...G...Ghosts?! Keep them away from me! Keep them away from me!
Heh, I knew I felt something between you two the last time. Sorry to hear it hasn't worked out for you, Amy.
(Heh, even with the size, his thingy is kinda cute. isn't it? Flailing around every time he moves...)
Huh... Don't pay much attention to it, Megumin. Some girls just prefer to shave themselves... down there...
Well, if he is to be believed, a certain perverted black mage claims to be over 180 years old, even though he doesn't look much older than me...
Behind?! Wait, w... what?! GAH!!! Stop!
Nope, even though I can see a lot of similarities to my world I can say for sure that this isn't it.
By the way, Nami, about what you said earlier, I don't know what Devil Fruits are, but if you have a couple maybe we can see what we can do with them after the game.

Well me and my friends do end up in a lot of adventures but not the relic hunting type... I guess there was this one time we had to find stars on pedestals to fix towns problems, but that all ended up being just a scheme of Satan to try to get a date with Arle...
A competition? Well, I could go the easy route and say maths. But here's a more unique one, vision. Mine is 20/4, which means I can see the Andromeda Galaxy, even in daylight!

condition.saying: Does anyone else want some cake?

case.state: Heh, Pinkie, you just reminded me of a certain suspicious green mage right now...
That's actually a pretty good question, any actual people from this world can give me and Stella a bit of info on that?
A net? Why would you even need a net to get cabbages?
Not really, I do know a self-proclaimed all-seeing divinator... Not that it ever helps her win Puyo matches though...
Does the time Satan sent me and my friends to a book world to find star relic thingies count, Fate? Even if it was just another one of his schemes to spend time with Arle?
He healed from breaking his legs in one day? This "Entity" thing you talk about sounds like a really useful thing to have... Even if that was indeed very dumb...
Oh, they run a greengrocery store, only the best fruits and vegetables in the town!
Hmmm, I feel you aren't that comfortable using your real name? What should I call you then, your idol one, or the real one?
(His thingy is really just... hanging there... isn't it? Flailing around every time he moves...)
Greetings! My name is Ringo! If we are going to play this game, we may as well introduce ourselves.
Oh yeah, in case you are wondering why I do those math expressions when someone else loses, it's kind of a quirk I got used to doing while casting spells during Puyo battles...
Oh, by the way, If you are wondering what is that jump thing I do when someone else loses, it's just a little thing I got used to doing when sending an attack to someone else during puyo battles...
In case you are wondering, Puyos are these colored jelly circle thingies. We get 4 of the same color together to make them pop, and then use the energy that comes from the pop to cast spells!
Well, I don't really know what "Paksis" means, but if you explain it to me, maybe we can both figure if that's correct.
A... apple? Well, if you promise to stop with the scares... maybe...
A... an apple? After you have been throwing ghosts my way the whole game?! No way!
Well, the thing is, no one really knows exactly how Puyo energy affects dimensions, and after a while everyone just started rolling with it as if it's nothing...
Well, I guess that would be a nice way to break the ice between strangers, and I do have a couple extra apples, so yeah, you can have one!
Sorry to disappoint, but no relation. I do like to sing though, so I wonder if there would be a chance to group if I ever meet him. We could even make a band! Something kinda like "The Ringles"!
To be honest I'm not used to being flirted with, Adrien. I must say though, it's a nice change of pace...

I'm going to take off my panties in front of a boy who was flirting with me, I mean don't get me wrong it's exciting but... I kinda expected it to be under a different type of circumstances... You know?
To be honest I'm not used to being flirted with, Noir. I must say though, it's a nice change of pace...

I'm going to take off my panties in front of a boy who was flirting with me, and I don't even know his real name... I mean don't get me wrong it's exciting but... I kinda expected it to be under a different type of circumstances... You know?
Oh, I'm not eating this apple. It was a gift from my grandmother and I just like to carry it with me because of that.
Well, I've had my share of space adventures so I'd rather stay with my feet at home, Jura. But I'd gladly teach your crew how to Puyo, you could even use it to power your ships!
Thanks, though no. My grandma is at another world, along with everyone else I know, which is why I need to win this game, hopefully that will get me back there.
You got it a bit wrong. I do like stuff that makes me think, but this apple was actually a gift from my grandma to me, Jessie.
Psychic, me? Nah, I just use know a little bit of attack magic, though I know a certain goth girl who'd probably be flattered if you told her that.
Ringo, but didn't I already say my name when we started the game?
Well, sadly Puyo magic really isn't that useful in an ordinary life, most of it being defensive or offensive magic. Which is why I get excited every time an adventure starts!
You would be right, popping Puyos is kinda like a puzzle, which is why I like it so much!
Sadly Sakura. I don't think this game works like that...
Well, it's funny to see what you come up with but... I hope you are not expecting me to flirt back, I'm terrible at this you know...
This is fine, anyone can do a 2-chain...
Well, twice in a row is still recoverable.
Getting hit with a 2-chain is nothing new.
A 3 chain would scare new players, but I can still reflect this damage...
I am starting to get really nervous here...
Usually I prefer to see longer chains do damage to other players!
W... well, while I did like the adrenaline rush a couple moments ago, I think I'll go with something less daring this time...
I may be winning, but it doesn't feel like it anymore. Luckily I still have one more trick up my sleeve.
My status as "leader" feels like a joke at this point... But there's still one more barrier for my pride.
Ah rats... was really hoping I could end this battle without having to get here...
Just let me win, please!
Being in front means I can take a couple risks. I don't mind if it fails from time to time.
Battles without at least a bit of back and forth feel a bit empty anyways...
Nice, we wouldn't like this to end so quickly, right?
One sided battles are boring anyways.
I may be in the lead, but I better stop playing risky or I'll regret it...
I need to be careful before I lose my lead.
You have to be careful when you are in front, sometimes you are just helping the opponents setup a comeback.
No perfect clear for me I see, oh well.
I knew a perfect game would be impossible.
A calculated risk.
Nothing to worry about, yet.
Probabilities dictated this would happen eventually.
Usually I like an even battle, but then again, we don't really play strip Puyo back at home...
I already am exposing more than I'm used to, I need to improve my plays.
Alright, time to change strategy, no problem.
Huh... I really hoped I wouldn't need to use my last delaying trick...
Well, I'm not giving up yet, I still have one thing to prevent further shame, and I think you may know what it is...
W... well, it has been a fair battle so far... so I guess I'll go with the rules...
W... well, I always play games till the end so...
Sometimes you feel you created a decent chain, just to see it reflected back at you...
Maybe I should have done a non strip practice game before this huh...
You guys are relentless on the beginner, huh?
It's okay. I just need to sharpen my attacks a bit more and I'll be right back in the game.
I can comeback from this, I'll just need to clear some nuisance Puyos... uh... I mean cards...
Hmmm, luck hasn't been on my side so far, but all I need is a good chain to bounce back!
Careful, sometimes when you think you throw garbage you may just be setting me for a comeback!
As that strange fish from space would say. I need to "step it up!" I only have one more chance before... that happens...
You guys are not satisfied with my chest? Well I have one more thing to go through before you get your perverted prize...
I mean, I knew I was on an uphill battle here, but I really wasn't expecting to get here so quick...
Gang up on the novice why don't you?!
Sometimes, you just have to learn from mistakes you know?
It's not that simple. Puyos started showing up at my world just a couple of years ago, but with them also a lot of people that already knew how to use them, and had been doing so for centuries.

No, I don't think we're talking about the same thing. While your energy source seems to be a lifeless crystal, our puyos are living gelatinous creatures. They are safe when we pop them by the way; they just get teleported away.
Ah... you know what, I'll deal with the puns, just for the sake of being able to say back home that a supermodel kept flirting with me....
Ah... you know what, I'll deal with the puns, just for the sake of being able to say back home that a superhero kept flirting with me....

Well, I haven't seen much of this world so far but, it actually seems pretty similar to mine... Hmm, perhaps I only got teleported to a different spot this time?... Uh question: Do any you know of any town called Suzuran?
No worms, just quality Ando family apples!
But I swear if I see one more of your ghosts you won't be getting more!
Hex, Maniac? No clue what you are talking about, but I kinda like the ring of it, who are those people?
Well, you are right on the friendly side at least, but as much as I like to sing, it seems my voice isn't exactly the best tuned one out there...
You know what Jessie, being around you is making me want to do something daring, so here we go...
Wait, so you are already familiar with Tetris, huh? Well, I can probably teach you how to puyo a bit later after the game, you should be able to pick it up in no time!
Heh, I may even ignore the bad puns if you keep it up...
Ideally this will be my only loss. Statistically speaking, though, I know the chances are minimal.
Statistics and probability tell me that this is unlikely to be my only loss, but one can hope...
Nothing to worry about Ringo, you still have plenty of protection yet.
Luckily I still have a couple protection shields in case I get sent more garbage blocks, Puyos... or I guess cards in this case...
Well, I guess taking off my shoes for a bit could be a nice way to let my feet rest.
Well, I gotta admit I'm starting to feel a bit nervous...
I rarely get out of this sweater in public, it's so comfy!
So much for keeping my decency, huh...
I'll admit this is getting further than I hoped, but I can't give up.
You can do this Ringo. Pretend you are at Suzaran town's beach...
I have to admit, it's kinda exciting to do something so daring for a change.
W... well... this is a challenge, but one I won't back off from if it helps me get back home...
So much for my cute Puyo bra... and my public image...
You didn't expect me to keep the socks all game, did you? I'll take off my wristband as well, because I feel counting it would be a cheap move...
Before you say anything, I know I have my socks and bracelet, I'm taking both of them off right now...
I... I haven't ever done this in public... give me a second...
So... How does that one cliche phrase go again? "I won't be able to get married anymore"?
Well... the one thing I have at my advantage is that no one I know is around here to see me do this...
Well, I was starting to get hot with this sweater anyways...
I won't need this sweater when we have such a warm weather anyways.
Someone is going all in from the start huh? I'm flattered, Cat... Noir, right?
Someone is going all in from the start huh? I'm flattered, Adrien, right?
T... thanks, Adrien. Somehow what you said was enough to make me feel comfortable even with my small size...
T... thanks, Adrien. Somehow what you said was enough to make me feel comfortable even with my small size...
Seriously, Adrien, you are making me blush...
Seriously, Noir, you are making me blush...
Heh, funnily enough, while Suzaran is connected to the sea, we have never bothered to name it something, we just call it "the sea".
Honestly, I'd prefer to be cute and covered right now, b.. but thanks...
Y... you know what, t... that was actually kinda exciting...
What do you mean my boobs are... oh... right, the bra... he he...
Heh, and suddenly I don't like the ring of it anymore, who would've known...
Y... you know being like this and seeing you be so calm is starting to make me feel a bit more daring, Jessie. If you wanna ask more personal questions I can probably deal with them now...
Don't worry, if you already know tetris as you said, puyo will come naturally, it did for the tetra crew after all!
(Seriously though, I really hope this doesn't devolve into just a lot of clothing puns...)
I'll just omit the fact that he was doing it while I was stripping off in front of him...
Heh, thanks, I honestly was fearing such a goofy bra would be a turn off for you...
I know it's a bit hypocritical of me to mock small penises due to my own situation but... at least breasts aren't the main part when it comes to women...
You can't win a game without receiving at least a couple nuisance Puyos.
A minor loss, let's continue.
Don't think all hands will be as easy, let's try again!
A slight miscalculation, nothing that can't be fixed...
I always love a challenge!
No matter... The more complex the equation, the more ecstatic I am to solve it!
At any rate, all's well ends well...
I know this bra may be a bit goofy, but then again I wasn't expecting to find myself in a situation like this...
Why are you looking at me like... oh, right... I chose the Puyo bra today, didn't I...
Yeah, yeah I know, a Puyo bra may look goofy but I like it alright? It's not like I was expecting to show it in public after all...
This is getting real risky now...
I know this will most likely come to bite me in the butt in the future, but I'm feeling a bit daring in case I lose again...
Well, I can feel my dignity starting to fade away...
I'd prefer if people didn't mention anything about my size, I know I'm a bit on the small side...
In case you are wondering, yeah, I know I had options other than my bra. But I felt a bit daring, alright?
I know they are small, you can stop staring at them!
Concentrate Ringo, you can save yourself from total embarrassment still...
I really, hope the statistics lean to my favor permanently from now on...
Well, no more stuff to hide after this...
W... well, this certainly feels as exciting as the quests back home... even if way more embarrassing...
My head is a total mess, I feel so ashamed right now... but strangely excited as well...
This clearly is a game for the daring...
My socks are going to get full of sand... but I prefer to keep my socks for now rather than risk losing early.
Oh right, our silent observer... ~name~, wasn't it?
W... Wait is that a... a G-GHOST?!!!!
Well, you certainly aren't the first guy I see on an extremely tight bodysuit...
I wonder where Tee is right now... Oh... Sorry. I was just reminded of a friend that also likes to use, uh... questionably tight bodysuits...
Calculus!
Sine!
Cosine!
Tangent!
Integral!
Permutation!
Solved it!
Got it!
I may be out of the match, but I can at least keep learning from everyone else...
I'm ashamed to admit it, but I did hope this would happen...
Hey if I'm already so deep on this mess, I may as well ogle everyone else a bit...
Look at my current state and compare it to you, you have no excuse to run away now...
What you will do next is nothing when you compare it with my current state.
No excuses, not when I'm already like this...
I may be out, but I'm still interested in seeing who will win the battle.
Sorry, I guess I kinda distracted you by doing this didn't I?
Oh right, our silent observer... ~name~, wasn't it?
Oh wow! Now that's a cool look! Just a shame about the cigarette...
More like "zombie-next-door"... Heh...
Well, if you are here, that probably explains in what world I landed this time. Tell me, Amy. Has that egg-guy given you more trouble since last time?
That is some nice armor! Kinda reminds me of what my friend Arle uses, she doesn't have a metal skirt though.
What even is that question, Streaming-girl?!
Really?! Even with this I managed to survive?!
That's what I call a last minute rescue!
Phew, I felt that really close...
W... wait, it wasn't me?! Yes!
I guess that means that... wait, what do you mean it wasn't me?
W... Wait is that a... a G-GHOST?!!!!
I wonder where Tee is right now... Oh... Sorry. I was just reminded of a friend that also likes to use, uh... questionably tight bodysuits...
Calculus!
Sine!
Cosine!
Tangent!
Integral!
Permutation!
Solved it!

Just wondering, what do you usually prefer for your feet? Something stylish, or something comfortable? I try to find a good middle ground, personally.

I can't help but wonder how clothing would differ from what we use if belts had never been invented.
Careful there, I hope that belt wasn't necessary to keep you from losing another layer too early.
Some people use belts, others don't. Personally, I think they look a bit uncomfortable for my taste.
Heh, I guess if you want to count that belt as a separate thing, no one is going to stop you.
Nothing personal, but try to keep those socks a bit away. They may look nice, but usually they don't smell nice.
I know some people prefer to go sock-less, but usually that only ends up hurting my feet if I try it.
Some people seem to have an obsession with socks, and even more for the stuff they protect. I mean to each their own, but you aren't one of those, right, ~player~?

So I've never been in a situation like this before, what am I supposed to do? Uhh... cheer you? Uh... yay?

Listen, you focus on your thing and I'll focus on mine... You can watch if you want though...
At the very least I'll be able to copy a thing or two from you now...
Okay, we can watch each other, but please no touching, I'd prefer to keep this to myself.
This is not going to devolve into anything dirtier after the game, right?
You are one brave woman, ~target~. I wish I can be as brave as you if I end up losing too.
This feels wrong, I'm like this and you have to do... that...
That sounds... incredibly inconvenient, does that mean that when you don't have a mask you may as well be armless?
You are doing it so... aggressively... are you sure you are not hurting yourself?
I feel so ashamed to stare, but I just can't seem to take my eyes away from it...
Do we all really make such funny faces when we make... that?
On the bright side, such personal moments are sure to turn us into close friends, right?
I don't think Ally ever had something like this in mind whenever she said "Let's fall in love!"
I wonder if Ritsukuma even has anything down there to... No, stop thinking about that, Ringo...
So I've never been in a situation like this before, what am I supposed to do? Uhh... cheer you? Uh... yay?
This world has such odd rules on their games...
Just pretend I'm not here, I'll be doing my best not to look if it makes you uncomfortable.
Is it rude if I look? Is it rude if I look away? Someone care telling me what to do here?
I was wondering, exactly how common these type of games are on this world? I can imagine they are a bit rarer than Puyo battles back at my own...
The people on this world must be as perverted as Schezo to come up with rules like this one...
Huh... I can't stop thinking that if I mess up, not only I won't be getting home, but I'll most likely end up doing the same as ~name~.
I don't know if having someone else do this at the same time is making this easier or harder...
Interesting, maybe if I do that too...
I see you looking over here while you do that, it's fine as long as you let me look too...
I guess we both got it rough here, huh?
Hang in there buddy, we can both get through this...
Doing this while another female does it, feels strangely romantic... In an extremely messed up kind of way...
I never expected to land in such an erotic situation as simultaneous masturbation today. It feels great...
Listen, I see you looking away from me when I look at you, it's fine, we are both doing the same thing anyways...
I may be enjoying our current situation a bit, but there's no reason to turn this forfeit into a competition, alright?!
Is it too creepy if I say that I would have liked to see that while I was doing it too?
At the risk of branding myself a Schezo, I kinda like what I'm seeing...
Having someone else play with themselves while I'm like this feels a bit odd, but not bad...
This is by far the riskiest thing I've ever done...
It's kinda odd to watch this while I have already done it, but I kinda enjoy it...
That looks like it would had been fun to try earlier...
I never expected to get such a close look to something like this without getting a boyfriend first...
You know? Maybe if we end up doing this again I'll open my mind to the idea of letting someone else touch me while doing that.
I feel a big bang is about to happen...
I... I never actually expected to see this so close...
Excuse my poor Schezo impression but, "It appears our story is about to reach its climax. Brace yourself for the climax!"
Seems like someone's "fever" bar is almost full now...
She really is lost on her mind right now, isn't she?
Man, it really feels a bit weird to see someone get so into... that, publicly.
Be careful there, you are going so fast I fear you may hurt yourself!
I know everyone is paying attention down there, but can we appreciate for a second how much her uh... "Puyos" are bouncing right now?
This is not the type of "pop" I like to see! Are you alright?!
What a moment for that rain to finish... Unless you did that on purpose? If so, uh... it looked pretty nice!
Gah! She's also a ghost too now! Run away everyone! Oh... she's back at her body... Still, WHAT THE FRACTION?!
S... sorry I tuned out for a sec... I... guess I got too much into the show there...
Now that's what I call a big bang!
That was loud! And messy!
I wonder if everyone gets so much into it like ~name~ just did...
I've seen something supposed to be so private, I shouldn't like it, but yet...
W... well, I brought this upon myself... You could have given me a bit of mercy though...
S... so just like that? I'm already out?!
R... really?! Me first?! Oh fish-sticks...
T... this was not supposed to end like this! I was expecting to at least outlast one of you guys...
Oh dear... This is worse than having a star shaped stack of Puyos coming your way...
I... I hoped it wouldn't come to this!
It's fine... not having experience is not the same as never have done it before. But thanks, Noir.
It's fine... not having experience is not the same as never have done it before. But thanks, Adrien.
It's fine... not having experience is not the same as never have done it before. I just hope you don't mind me glaring at you a bit while I do it, Adrien.
There's not much chance of doing this back at home due to all the adventures, so sorry if I look a bit awkward...
Well, I guess I won't be going back home with my dignity, but maybe I can at least enjoy my time until the rematch?
I mean, you usually hope you are attractive enough to have someone else think of you when doing this but, it's so strange for that someone else to also be in the room with you...
I'll try to go longer if you also promise to go for a bit longer...
There's other people doing this right now you know, why don't you look at them instead for a second.
Well, at least this should keep my mind out of the fact that I'm stuck on this world for a moment...
I really hope no one I know comes here in the next couple of minutes...
I guess I do need to do this a bit more often for my own health...
I'll assume my chances of this game transporting me home at this point are none, but I may as well try to enjoy it...
Oh... I am way more sensitive than I expected today...
I... I just thought, what if I end up getting transported in the middle of doing this?! I wouldn't ever be able to get out of home if I ended up at Suzuran town like this...
Hmmm...
When I said I was a fast learner, I didn't mean it just for games...
While I do like the game, I hope this one doesn't show up back at home. I don't know if I could bear doing this in front of Schezo or Lemres...
Never I expected myself to end up doing something so... rebellious...
Ritsukuma would be so ashamed of me if he saw me right now...
Not going to lie, I'm starting to believe this game won't help me get back home...
When I think about it, being alone on a strange world may mean I can do stuff like this without worrying about it coming to haunt me in the future...
*Low constant moans of pleasure*
What is happening? Usually I'm not this... sensitive, nor wet...
I'll admit, I find myself craving for adventures a lot of the time, life used to be pretty boring before the Puyo problems started...
Focus on yourself, Ringo. Ignore the fact that everyone on this room is watching you...
I know you guys are trying to encourage me, but having all eyes on me right now isn't helping!
Leaving aside the embarrassment of doing this in front of others, this is great...
Once you get a rhythm going, it feels so good...
I just need to keep up like this for a bit longer and I'll...
*Louder than before moans of pure pleasure*
This feels way too good...
Oh yeah... I feel it coming...
♥ A bit more... A bit more! ♥
10-chain, perfect clear!
Ascension!
Just an imitation!
Well, I don't know if you've noticed, but I've kinda been levitating almost every time someone else lost a round, Perona...
Don't be silly! I'm not going to eat this apple; It holds too much sentimental value... And also is like 2 years old...
Strange, just like when losing a Puyo battle clears your mind, losing this game has made me feel more comfortable being like this...
I gotta admit, I enjoyed the game, shameful acts and all...
You know, once you stay naked for a bit, a bit of the shame starts to fade away...
I'll admit it, that was kinda, really, really relaxing...
Even with all things I've said, please never tell about this to anyone you meet that may know me, please...
If a word of what I did today manages to get back to any of my friends, I'll never be able to live it down...
I may make an attempt to uh... enjoy myself a bit more, once I get back home that is...
I hope at least I didn't look too awkward doing it, did I?
Hmmm, I wonder if any of my friends would... No, you dummy, take those crazy thoughts out of your head...
I sure hope this is a one off adventure type deal, cause I sure won't be able to do this with any random enemy I encounter...
Well, that's one thing I can scratch out of things I never expected myself to do...
If you ever end up showing up at my world, please don't mention this to anyone and I'll give you some fruits from my family's business in exchange for your discretion...
I honestly doubt this game has any actual magical properties to it, but it sure felt like it did a couple moments ago...
At this point, nothing I say will produce a net positive impression, huh?
At any rate, at least I can say I did like the rush of doing something so... risky, for once...
Well, I guess I better start thinking on what else to do if this game doesn't help me get back home.
That sure was something else... ♥
That was perfect! But I'm still stuck in this world...
Winner every time! Hmmm.. but it seems I'm still here...
I enjoy a victory as much as everyone else, but it seems this game wasn't enough to get me back home, any other ideas, anyone?
I guess that'll do. Strange... I'm not back at home.
Still on this world after winning huh? I guess I'll need to investigate more...
I got to keep my dignity and win the game. And while I'm not back home yet I'm sure I'll think of something. So thanks for this fun experience!
Well, that was an experience, but it seems it didn't work, wanna try to battle Puyo instead next time?
That was certainly something, but I think I'll stick to games I know next time...
Thanks for the game everyone, but it didn't help, I'll have to think of something else once I dress back up...
W... well, I may not be back home, but I still had a lot of fun being a bit more daring than usual, so thanks for that everyone.
Well, I may have lost, but at least I'm going away with a unique experience today, thanks for the game to both of you, Adrien, and ~human~.
Well, I may have lost, but at least I'm going away with a unique experience today, thanks for the game, Adrien, ~human~, and the rest too!
Huh... back to square one...
It was fun, but I'll probably need to try something else to go back home...
Well, that's game one, but back home problems never get solved by just one game, let's try again!
That may not have gone as I expected, but maybe a rematch will help me get closer to return, what do you say, ~name~?
Well, this didn't work, any ideas everyone?
